text: The colors are chosen according to colorbrewer.org. Colorbrewer.org also takes people with colorblindness into account. The lighter the color the less corrupt (corruption is not a good thing, that's why I chose a darker color for more corruption. I chose for a the lightest fill when you hover the mouse because it's a color that stands out. I chose for the white lining because it separates the country nicely. My map enables a box with information to pop-up when you hover over the country and it changes the color of the country so people know what you selected.
